General.Name: Alchimie Sa
General.Description: Alchimie S.A.S. operates as an OTT video streaming platform that allows media, brands, and talents to launch video-on-demand programs for audiences and customers in France and internationally. It operates a video platform to co-publish thematic channels. Alchimie S.A.S. is based in Aubervilliers, France.

6.Name: Mr. Barry  Llewellyn
6.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Alchimie UK

9.Name: Mr. Sam  Thompson
9.Title: Chief Content Officer & Chief Creative Officer
